title: All our futures
creator_credit: Harold Mantell Inc and Harold Mantell
brief_description: Narrated by Peter Ustinov this film shows the 25 years of service to children by UNICEF. Beginning in 12 European countries where five million children were given food, medicine and clothing during the emergency period after World War II, and then moving - over the years and to many different places - to show its diversified work in many more countries including Africa and Latin America.
